title: TSP-30-RankTravelOptionsRequest Request Schema
description: Schema for the travel options ranking request sent by TSP.

returnId.description: Unique Id for this booking - taken from the original booking request sent from RMP to TSP.

travelOptions.description: A list of 1 to 9 travel options.

providerFeedback.description: If fewer than 9 travel options are provided then the reason must be specified.

limitedOptionsReason.description: The reason why fewer than 9 travel options have been provided

limitedOptionsDescription.description: A detailed description of why there are fewer than 9 travel options

travelOption.description: A travel option that meets the requirements of the return case.

totalTicketPricePence.description: Total price for all tickets for all travellers including any escorts and their return flights.

departureDateTime.description: The date time when the flight departs. Local time is assumed. Do not include timezone information in the value. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss. Must be included for the first flight. Optional for subsequent flights.
